meanings.definition: to inflate or fill with air
meanings.sent1: She sufflates the balloon for the party.
meanings.sent2: The tire sufflates quickly when punctured.
meanings.sent3: The clown sufflates a balloon animal with great skill.
meanings.sent4: His ego sufflates whenever he receives praise.
meanings.sent5: The bouncy castle sufflates with joy as children play on it.

meanings.sent1: The sufflates balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The sufflates beach ball bounced playfully in the pool.
meanings.sent3: The sufflates mattress made the sleepover extra comfy.
meanings.sent4: Her sufflates cheeks showed she was holding her breath.
meanings.sent5: The sufflates life jacket kept him safe while swimming.
